Aave.title: Aave
Aave.content: Aave is an open source and non-custodial liquidity protocol for earning interest on deposits and borrowing assets. Evmos will also enable cross-chain applications to leverage AAVE’s liquidity while being deployed to other Cosmos chains such as Terra.

Huobi Global.title: Huobi Global
Huobi Global.content: Huobi Global is scheduled to list EVMOS (Evmos) on July 19, 2022.

Cronus Finance.title: Cronus Finance
Cronus Finance.content: Cronus Finance is a fully permissionless and composable AMM built on Evmos.

Kinesis Labs.title: Kinesis Labs
Kinesis Labs.content: Kinesis is the first stableswap on Evmos, aiming to bring the 180B stablecoin market to Cosmos. We allow users to swap stablecoins for other stablecoins at the lowest fees and the lowest slippage.

Staking.title: Staking
Staking.content: The x/inflation module mints new Evmos tokens and allocates them in daily epochs to Evmos stakers.

Diffusion.title: Diffusion Finance
Diffusion.content: Diffusion is a Uniswap v2 fork. It’ll be one of the first AMMs for Evmos, an EVM on Cosmos that leverages the Cosmos SDK to enable use cases around composability, interoperability, and fast-finality.

Osmosis-LP.title: Osmosis-LP
Osmosis-LP.content: 600,000 Evmos are distributed over the course of 90 days for 14 day bonding time only on EVMOS/OSMO Pool 722. This would amount to ~6,666 Evmos per day in external rewards.

Restake App.title: Restake App
Restake App.content: REStake allows validators to auto-compound your staking rewards.

FRAX.title: FRAX
FRAX.content: FRAX provide users with greater accessibility to the DeFi ecosystem as stablecoins are pegged to fiat currencies but exist natively as cryptocurrency allowing for easy interaction with decentralized protocols. Evmos DeFi protocols will be able to integrate the FRAX stablecoin, offering users stability, reliability, and liquidity.

DefiLlama.title: DefiLlama
DefiLlama.content: Open and transparent DeFi TVL and analytics.

NovaDAO.title: NovaDAO
NovaDAO.content: NovaDAO is a reserve currency protocol and community built on the Cosmos Ecosystem. NovaDAO recognizes the early success of OlympusDAO in creating a decentralized reserve currency, and we have decided to bring this concept to Cosmos.

Diffusion-Usage.title: Diffusion-Usage
Diffusion-Usage.content: Diffusion smart contracts is whitelisted to get gas subsidies for their users for a period of six months (stops in November) in order to make it easier to onboard users to Evmos.25% of the Evmos block emission is going toward a pool dedicated to incentivizing users in the form of deferred Gas Rebates.

Commonwealth.title: Commonwealth
Commonwealth.content: Platform to discuss, organize, and grow the Evmos decentralized community

Fireblocks.title: Fireblocks
Fireblocks.content: Fireblocks is a digital asset custody, transfer and settlement platform. MPC-CMP wallet technology. 24/7 access.

EvmosJS.title: EvmosJS
EvmosJS.content: JS and TS libs for Evmos.

Flux.title: Flux
Flux.content: Flux is the trustless data layer for web3. Flux is a cross-chain oracle that provides smart contracts with access to economically secure data feeds on anything.

Osmosis.title: Osmosis
Osmosis.content: Osmosis is a fair-launched, customizable automated market maker for interchain assets that allows the creation and management of non-custodial, self-balancing, interchain token index similar to one of Balancer.

Digifinex.title: Digifinex
Digifinex.content: First CEX to list Evmos with the following trading pairs: EVMOS/USDT, EVMOS/ETH and EVMOS/BTC

Exswap.title: Exswap
Exswap.content: Exswap is a community-focused Uniswap v2 fork launching on Evmos. Our goal is to be the #1 AMM and the go-to protocol for the Evmos ecosystem.

Oasis Starter.title: Oasis Starter
Oasis Starter.content: Oasis Starter is a cross-chain community governed decentralized launchpad powered by Oasis Network that provides disruptive projects and builders a platform for raising capital where the Starter community decides what projects to list. Bridging the gaps to create more open and free fundraising platform for all. Coming to EVMOS soon.

Earnmos.title: Earnmos
Earnmos.content: First yield optimizer for Evmos and Cosmos Interchain Ecosystem

tofuNFT.title: tofuNFT
tofuNFT.content: tofuNFT is the largest multichain NFT marketplace for GameFi, DeFi and Collectibles. tofuNFT supports 25+ multiple chains, BNB, Ethereum, Avalanche, Polygon, Fantom, Arbitrum, Optimism and so on. We are not only BNB, Harmony, Arbitrum, Moonbeam and Astar’s No. 1 with a trading volume NFT Marketplace, but also top rank volume on several chains.

Coinbase Cloud.title: Coinbase Cloud
Coinbase Cloud.content: Coinbase Cloud will provide Evmos developers with a high-throughput and reliable RPC cluster capable of handling at least five million calls a day. Developers will have the ability to subscribe to events utilizing an Ethereum Websocket that is exposed on their RPC cluster, allowing them to seamlessly port over their existing dApp workflows onto Evmos.

Orbital Apes.title: Orbital Apes
Orbital Apes.content: 10,000 Orbital Apes exploring the Cosmos Ecosystem.

Treasureland.title: Treasureland
Treasureland.content: Treasureland is a cross-chain NFT platform for NFT issuance, NFT trading, NFT collections and tailored in-shop services.

EvmoSwap.title: EvmoSwap
EvmoSwap.content: EvmoSwap is a decentralized exchange (DEX) on the Evmos Chain. Swap, earn, farm, and launch your projects, powered by DeFi.

Nomad x Connext.title: Nomad x Connext
Nomad x Connext.content: With Nomad and Connext, institutions and end-users will be able to send value and call data between the Ethereum and Evmos ecosystems. This will allow Ethereum and other EVM chains’ ERC-20 tokens to be available on Evmos and subsequently the entire Cosmos ecosystem via IBC.

Evmos.me.title: Evmos.me
Evmos.me.content: Evmos.me allows users to interact with both the Cosmos and Ethereum ecosystems through a single unified and intuitive interface. Evmos Rektdrop participants will also be claiming rewards via Evmos.me.

Revest.title: Revest
Revest.content: Mint Smart Vaults, earn rewards by staking RVST tokens and NFTs, and much more!xx

Thorus.title: Thorus
Thorus.content: Thorus is an all in one cross-chain DeFi Platform with an adaptable treasury system, a 'Token Holder First' approach, and one of the lowest swap fee (0.1%).

Evmos Explorers.title: Evmos Explorers
Evmos Explorers.content: 10000 Evmos Explorers doing their own thing on Evmos!

Evmos Domains.title: Evmos Domains
Evmos Domains.content: Evmos Domains is a decentralized name service for linking .evmos names to data like addresses.

GamyFi Platform.title: GamyFi Platform
GamyFi Platform.content: GamyFi platform is a fantasy sports platform & open, multi-chain NFT marketplace supporting all ERC721 NFT tokens.

Disperze Wallet.title: Disperze Wallet
Disperze Wallet.content: Allows users to transfer, vote and stake their tokens using Keplr or Metamask extensión.

Metalancer.title: Metalancer
Metalancer.content: Metalancer is a Balancer V1 fork. An automated portfolio manager and trading platform

SpaceFi.title: SpaceFi
SpaceFi.content: SpaceFi is a multichain deployed, community driven platform with DEX, NFT, Starter and DAO, on #Evmos & #Celo.

Expanding space.title: Expanding space
Expanding space.content: Expanding space is the first NFT marketplace created from scratch on Evmos. It gives you the opportunity to freely interact with your NFT, while leaving the lowest possible commissions.

Chain Monitor.title: Chain Monitor
Chain Monitor.content: Chain monitor allows users to inspect all relevant blockchain information.

FoxWallet.title: FoxWallet
FoxWallet.content: FoxWallet is a safe and easy-to-use decentralized Web3 wallet, dedicated to creating an entrance and connection to the Web3 world.

Mintscan.title: Mintscan
Mintscan.content: Developed by the Cosmostation, the Mintscan explorer supports the most Cosmos chains available including Evmos. It currently only supports Cosmos transactions but EVM transactions are on the roadmap.

EVM Explorer.title: EVM Explorer
EVM Explorer.content: Blockchain explorer for the Evmos Network.

Erc20 Module.title: Erc20 Module
Erc20 Module.content: Our ERC20 module allows defi protocols to seamlessly integrate with Evmos and the Cosmos ecosystem. Using the x/erc20 module, developers can build smart contracts on Evmos and use the generated tokens for other applications in the Cosmos ecosystem

DForce.title: DForce
DForce.content: decentralized finance protocols covering assets, lending, and trading

Coslend.title: Coslend
Coslend.content: Coslend lending protocol is the first money market on Evmos Ecosystem based on Compound, one of the largest DeFi protocols. We are aiming to create a safe, open and transparent decentralized financial money market.

Asteroids Money.title: Asteroids Money
Asteroids Money.content: First @tombfinance fork pegged to the price of 1 EVMOS floating in the cosmos. Comming soon.

Evmosians.title: Asteroids Money
Evmosians.content: Evmosians NFTs collections will consist of many races and creatures. Each collection will have its own meaning and value.

PhotonSwap.title: PhotonSwap
PhotonSwap.content: An AMM currently based on Uniswap v2 but working towards pancake to make it easier for vaults and other staking mechanism

Midas Capita1.title: Midas Capita1
Midas Capita1.content: Rari Fork for Lending, borrowing & yield for DeFi

DEXPAD.title: DEXPAD
DEXPAD.content: DexPad.IO is multichain launchpad with many tools for new projects such as Token Minting, Token Launch, Lockers (LP & Token) and Airdroppers

Evmos Stats.title: Evmos Stats
Evmos Stats.content: Evmos blockchain stats about validators, inflation, bonded tokens and many more parameters.

Perci Finance.title: Perci Finance
Perci Finance.content: The First Borrowing Protocol on Evmos

Cevmos.title: Cevmos
Cevmos.content: Cevmos is an open, modular stack for EVM-based applications utilizing Celestia rollups. The Cevmos stack will center around an optimized settlement chain for rollups that is based on Evmos.

MetaMask.title: MetaMask
MetaMask.content: MetaMask is an extension for accessing Evmos (EVM) enabled distributed applications, or 'Dapps' in your browser

Keplr.title: Keplr
Keplr.content: Keplr Wallet is the first, and leading, IBC-enabled wallet for the Cosmos ecosystem. Stake your tokens, start using blockchain apps, and manage tokens in just one wallet.

UMA.title: UMA
UMA.content: UMA’s optimistic oracle service will equip Evmos developers with decentralized and battle tested optimistic oracles to integrate within decentralized applications.

KYVE.title: KYVE
KYVE.content: KYVE offers a decentralized blockchain storage solution that ensures data validity and availability.

Pocket Network.title: Pocket Network
Pocket Network.content: Pocket Network is an RPC relay protocol that incentivizes Full-Node operators to provide accurate data and abundant bandwidth to decentralized applications.
